const brands=[...new Set(products.map(p=>p.brand).filter(Boolean))];const markets=[...new Set(products.map(p=>p.shop_id).filter(Boolean))];setFilterOptions({material:materials,color:colors,size:sizes,availability:availabilities,brand:brands,market:markets});}).catch(error=>{console.error('Error fetching products:',error);});},[initialPrice]);// Исправленный handlePriceChange
